messages.title: Straight talking. Vote UKIP
messages.content: I believe that the LibLabCon parties have let the people of this country down. There is a great disconnect between the ordinary man and the political class.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say NO to mass immigration. UKIP believes in British jobs for British workers. Want to freeze immigration for five years and use a visa system for migrant workers who skills are needed.
Say YES to referendums on all major issues.

Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels. Want to return power to the people with local votes and national referendums. Only by using UKIP and leaving the European Union can we restore freedom to the British people.
As a Christian I believe that recent equality laws have led to persecution of Christians in many sections of our nation. I would lobby to repeal these laws which are an attack on our liberties.
Introduce workfare and truly protect the vulnerable in our society.

issues.brexitEurope: Only by using UKIP and leaving the European Union can we restore freedom to the British people.
issues.governance: There is a great disconnect between the ordinary man and the political class. Want to return power to the people with local votes and national referendums.
issues.immigration: Say NO to mass immigration. UKIP believes in British jobs for British workers. Want to freeze immigration for five years and use a visa system for migrant workers who skills are needed.
issues.socialWelfare: Introduce workfare and truly protect the vulnerable in our society.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am a Christian, married with one son, and I believe that people on a low wage should not pay tax. UKIP believes in British jobs for British workers.

images.caption: Neil Miney, Liverpool, Wavertree - UK Independence Party leaflet.
